name: Not Alone (Daltman)
description:
Welcome to my maze!

I hope you can complete it.

All you need to do is collect all the red gems and not get caught.

So? Shall you enter or are you scared?

Download the zip, unload it, and play

(I messed up a bit of the code so you return to the menu when you win instead of the win screen, will update it after the jam ends!)
